alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, west central Horry, central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hyman to near Galivants Ferry. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Hemingway, Galivants Ferry, Hyman, Hannah, Cades, Poston, Brittons Neck, Gresham, Hebron, Friendfield, New Hope, Evergreen, Kingsburg, Scranton, Coward, Aynor and Lake City Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
